description:
Don George is the owner of the Battle Club in Karakusa Town in the Isshu region. The Pokémon Battle Club allows Trainers to battle freely and improve each other`s techniques.
While investigating the break-in to the storage area of the Battle Club, Satoshi believe he sees a Blacky on the screen. Don was excited as he wanted to get a Pokémon that wasn`t from the Isshu region. When Don and his staff caught up with the `Blacky`, Nyarth revealed himself and took off. Don was upset but then realized that Nyarth also was a Pokémon that wasn`t from the Isshu region but by then was long gone.
name: Don George
